mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_info(notice_title, notice_content, notice_teacher_seq, notice_class_seq, notice_category) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{teacherNo}, #{classNo}, #{category});
mapper.select:
select count(*) from notice_info where notice_title like '%${keyword}%'
and notice_class_seq = #{classNo}

select a.*, b.teacher_name as authorName from ( select notice_seq as no, notice_category as category, notice_title as title, notice_regdt as regDt, notice_content as contents, notice_teacher_seq as authorNo, LAG(notice_seq) over (order by notice_seq) as prevNo, LAG(notice_title) over (order by notice_seq) as prevTitle, LEAD(notice_seq) over (order by notice_seq) as nextNo, LEAD(notice_title) over (order by notice_seq) as nextTitle from notice_info ) a inner join teacher_info b on a.authorNo = b.teacher_seq where no = #{noticeNo}
select nfile_name as fileName, SUBSTRING_INDEX(nfile_name, '.', -1) as fileType, CONCAT('/file/notice/', nfile_name) as downloadURL from notice_info_file where nfile_notice_seq = #{noticeNo}
mapper.delete: delete from notice_info_file where nfile_name = #{filename} and nfile_notice_seq = #{noticeNo}
